channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL BigFix Inventory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL BigFix Inventory

item.title: CVE-2021-27759|2024-08-03T21:26:10.810Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20inventory
item.description: This vulnerability arises because the application allows the user to perform some sensitive action without verifying that the request was sent intentionally. An attacker can cause a victim's browser to emit an HTTP request to an arbitrary URL in the application.

item.title: CVE-2021-27758|2024-08-03T21:26:10.629Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20inventory
item.description: There is a security vulnerability in login form related to Cross-site Request Forgery which prevents user to login after attacker spam to login and system blocked victim's account.
